text.description:
Dave is confused by Sarasota, a town that reminds him almost of the Cape, and gets some Italian wisdom about toppings.
Download The One Bite App to see more and review your favorite pizza joints: https://onebite.app/download
Follow on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/stoolpresidente/ Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/stoolpresidente
Check out Barstool Sports for more: http://www.barstoolsports.com
Follow Barstool Sports here: Facebook: https://facebook.com/barstoolsports Twitter: https://twitter.com/barstoolsports Instagram: http://instagram.com/barstoolsports
text.fulltitle: Barstool Pizza Review - Venezia Italian Restaurant (Sarasota, FL)
